description_for_human: Plugin for finding the trending music across the world, by genre, countries, and top songs globally.
description_for_model: Find the most trending music around the world. You can search by country, genre, or globally. Use the country's ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for country-specific searches. For genre-specific searches, use the genre's specific code. Available genres: POP, HIP_HOP_RAP, DANCE, ELECTRONIC, RNB_SOUL, ALTERNATIVE, ROCK, LATIN, FILM_TV_STAGE, COUNTRY, AFRO_BEATS, WORLDWIDE, REGGAE_DANCE_HALL, HOUSE, K_POP, FRENCH_POP, SINGER_SONGWRITER, REGIONAL_MEXICANO.

elements.content: Welcome to the Trending Music Plugin!
This plugin allows you to get trending music from Shazam.
To use this plugin, just ask question about the most trending music around the world, by genre, country or globally
